remarks: Elementhood in the set of nonzero algebraic numbers.  ' Only if ' part of ~ elaa2 .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
elaa2lem.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. AA ) $.
elaa2lem.an0 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
elaa2lem.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` ZZ ) ) $.
elaa2lem.gn0 $e |- ( ph -> G =/= 0p ) $.
elaa2lem.ga $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` A ) = 0 ) $.
elaa2lem.m $e |- M = sup ( { n e. NN0 | ( ( coeff ` G ) ` n ) =/= 0 } , RR , `' < ) $.
elaa2lem.i $e |- I = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( ( coeff ` G ) ` ( k + M ) ) ) $.
elaa2lem.f $e |- F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... ( ( deg ` G ) - M ) ) ( ( I ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) $.
elaa2lem $p |- ( ph -> E. f e. ( Poly ` ZZ ) ( ( ( coeff ` f ) ` 0 ) =/= 0 /\ ( f ` A ) = 0 ) ) $.
$d A f $.
$d A k $.
$d A k z $.
$d F f $.
$d G k $.
$d G k z $.
$d G n $.
$d I k z $.
$d M k $.
$d M k z $.
$d M n $.
$d k ph $.
$d ph z $.
